turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i assist you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to purchase some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can place the order for you. What do you want to eat?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, we'd love to have three medium pizzas, one with spinach and.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ground beef.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one with.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One Meat Lover's and.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do one Italian-style. And they should all be thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, it doesn't look like bella luna has ground beef.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want another topping?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have roast beef?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: or sausage, sure. We don't have roast beef just put it down for a Okay, put it down for a sausage, then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they do not. They do have pepperoni and sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: But down for sausage, okay? And they should all be thin crust pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is 3 medium pizzas, 1 with spinach and sausage, 1 meat lovers, and 1 italian style, all with thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: tomatoes on the one with spinach?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want fresh tomatoes, or sun dried?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, Sundried.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, so the updated order is 3 medium pizzas, 1 with spinach, sausage and sun dried tomatoes, 1 meat lovers, and 1 italian style, all with thin crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeap.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for the order is $56.97.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yap.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a place of pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've ordered your pizzas. It'll be ready for pick up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Sounds good. No, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, take care.
